bullets: Enhanced integrations across NetSuite, Xero, Intacct, and QBO; improved sync reliability and reduced error rates.
Designed scalable backend solutions for high-volume APIs; reduced latency and improved maintainability.
Integrated Grafana and Sentry for proactive monitoring; minimized downtime and accelerated incident response.
Led production deployments; ensured smooth, low-risk rollouts and operational stability.
Automated integration workflows with custom tooling; increased efficiency and reduced manual effort.
Built chatbot to improve user communication.
Developed CRM for data visualization and system management.
Prepared datasets and developed web app interfaces and APIs.
Built API to generate XML for Google Search.
